question: Which Indian company has commenced phase III trials of Covid-19 vaccine 'Covaxin'?
explanation:
Bharat Biotech has recently commenced phase III trials of Covid-19 vaccine Covaxin, which is Indiaâ€™s first indigenous Covid-19 vaccine candidate.
Another Hyderabad-based pharma company Biological E Ltd has begun its Phase I-II trials of its Covid-19 vaccine. The Phase III trials will be conducted in partnership with ICMR and will involve around 26,000 volunteers across India.
